adv:
It is easier to just click on the dimensions and see a relevant plot. So I don't have to think which plot to make for one particular aspect I am looking for in the data. 

The related views save time as they already add additional relevant dimensions on top of my created chart.
disadv: The recommendations were useful but most of the time distractive and too many for answering specific questions. While free exploration they added more value. Though comparing long lists of bar were not fun. It could have been better if recommendations could highlight minimum, maximum values to avoid scrolling and linear searching.
